title: 2018 Exhibited at Bauma Shanghai
excerpt: In 2018, SHUNDE MECHANICAL PARTS CO.,LTD successfully exhibited at Bauma Shanghai
content: In 2018, SHUNDE MECHANICAL PARTS CO.,LTD successfully exhibited at Bauma Shanghai, showcasing the company's advanced technology and high-quality products in the field of machinery fittings to global customers. During this exhibition, Shunde had in-depth exchanges with many domestic and foreign customers and partners, further expanding the international market and enhancing the brand influence. The exhibition not only deepened the company's cooperation and communication in the industry, but also laid a solid foundation for future development.

title: 2025 Exhibited at Bauma Shanghai
excerpt: In 2025, SHUNDE MECHANICAL PARTS CO.,LTD successfully exhibited at Bauma Shanghai
content: In 2025, SHUNDE MECHANICAL PARTS CO.,LTD successfully exhibited at Bauma Shanghai, showing global customers the company's latest technological achievements and high-quality products in the field of machinery fittings. In this exhibition, Shunde presented a variety of high-performance machinery parts, attracting the attention of many domestic and foreign customers, and expanding international cooperation channels through in-depth exchanges with industry-leading enterprises. Through this exhibition, the company further consolidated its brand influence and demonstrated its innovative strength and global competitiveness in the field of machinery manufacturing.
